message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $9,000 is significantly below its true worth. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This offer reflects the product's value while still being a good deal for you.
